channel.title: David Woodier on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in David Woodier on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Why attachment matters
item.description: HM - Helen Minnis DW - David Woodier In the following interview between Professor Helen Minnis, from University of Glasgow, and David Woodier, a teacher, adoptive parent and blogger for Scottish Attachment in Action, Helen speaks about why attachment matters to her. Themes emerging from the interview may well resonate with those living and working with children and young people who have had an adverse start in life. DW My name is David Woodier.
